sense.def:
To thrash someone
pomeni nekoga večkrat udariti.

seg.quote: We were thrashed a lot at school.
He got a thrashing from his father.

sense.def:
To thrash someone in a game or contest
pomeni nekoga hudo poraziti v tekmovanju;

seg.quote: ...the thrashing our team got at Southampton.

sense.def:
To thrash around
pomeni hitro in s silo zvijati in obračati telo.

cit.quote: otepati okoli sebe, opletati z rokami in nogami

seg.quote: The boy was thrashing around, trying to get free.

sense.def:
To thrash out something
pomeni o nečem, na primer politični usmeritvi, razpravljati toliko časa, da dosežemo obliko, ki je sprejemljiva za vse.

seg.quote: ...an agreement that we had already thrashed out.
